morning.title: Good morning
morning.content_1: ‚ÄúEither you run the day or the day runs you‚Äù
morning.content_2: ‚ÄúHave a happy and lucky new day‚Äù
morning.content_3: ‚ÄúThis message of mine will help me send you a little luck, a little more fun and a lot of my love‚Äù
morning.content_4: ‚ÄúThe leaves are green, my heart is red. Have a nice morning‚Äù
morning.content_5: ‚ÄúAbsolutely focus to have a productive day‚Äù
morning.content_6: ‚ÄúWishing you a new day full of energy for a productive day‚Äù
morning.content_7: ‚ÄúYour spirit is good today. Have a great working day‚Äù
morning.content_8: ‚ÄúYou look energetic today. I think today will be a great day for you. Wish your job favorable and successful‚Äù
morning.content_9: ‚ÄúYou were the first person I met this morning. Have a good morning and a productive day‚Äù
morning.content_10: ‚ÄúLooks like you have something unhappy. Forget it to start a productive day‚Äù
morning.content_11: ‚ÄúDid you sleep well yesterday? Wishing you a new day of luck and fruitfulness‚Äù
morning.content_12: ‚ÄúYou were the first person I met this morning. Have a good morning and a productive day‚Äù
morning.content_14: ‚ÄúWishing you a brilliant and happy morning‚Äù
morning.content_15: ‚ÄúThis life is a surprise when there are friends. Have a happy and exciting new day‚Äù
morning.content_16: ‚ÄúHope this message will bring you happiness and luck from my place‚Äù
morning.content_17: ‚ÄúWhen I get up early and don‚Äôt know what to do. I miss you. Have a nice day‚Äù
morning.content_18: ‚ÄúDo not be sad because something is old. Live for today and tomorrow. Have a nice day‚Äù
morning.content_19: ‚ÄúEach new day will come and contain many new things. Live your best and enjoy your day‚Äù
morning.content_20: ‚ÄúThink about the good things you want and live energetically every day. Good morning‚Äù
morning.content_21: ‚ÄúLive like a free bird flying into the air it wants. Today is for you. Do the things that are comfortable for you‚Äù
morning.content_22: ‚ÄúThere is nothing more precious than you treasure your life. Wish you a new day filled with optimism‚Äù
morning.content_23: ‚ÄúBy miles, you are far from me. By thoughts, you are close to me. By hearts, you are in me. Have a great time‚Äù
morning.content_24: ‚ÄúTry to take advantage of every opportunity that comes you way‚Äù
morning.content_25: ‚ÄúChange will never happen when people lack the ability and courage to see themselves for who they are‚Äù
morning.content_27: ‚ÄúChange your thoughts and you change your world‚Äù
morning.content_28: ‚ÄúThey always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself‚Äù
morning.content_29: ‚ÄúThere are no secret to success. It is the result of preparation, hard word and learning from failure‚Äù
morning.content_30: ‚ÄúThe beginning is the most important part of the work‚Äù
morning.content_31: ‚ÄúWhen you like your work every day is a holiday‚Äù
morning.content_32: ‚ÄúDoing what you like is freedom. Liking what you do is happiness‚Äù
morning.content_33: ‚ÄúAs a cure for worrying, work is better than whiskey‚Äù
morning.content_34: ‚ÄúI can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can‚Äôt accept not trying‚Äù
morning.content_35: ‚ÄúCan anything be sadder than work left unfinished? Yes, work never begun‚Äù
morning.content_36: ‚ÄúRule: It is the quality of time at work that counts and the quantity of time at home that matters‚Äù
morning.content_37: ‚ÄúNo challenge shall never know all its capabilities‚Äù
morning.content_38: ‚ÄúSuccess is a journey not a destination‚Äù

afternoon.title: Good afternoon
afternoon.content_1: ‚ÄúEither you run the day or the day runs you‚Äù
afternoon.content_2: ‚ÄúThis afternoon, I hope everything will be all right‚Äù

evening.title: Good evening
evening.content_1: ‚ÄúEither you run the day or the day runs you‚Äù
evening.content_2: ‚ÄúBy miles, you are far from me. By thoughts, you are close to me. By hearts, you are in me. Have a great time‚Äù
evening.content_3: ‚ÄúTry to take advantage of every opportunity that comes you way‚Äù
evening.content_4: ‚ÄúChange will never happen when people lack the ability and courage to see themselves for who they are‚Äù
evening.content_6: ‚ÄúChange your thoughts and you change your world‚Äù
evening.content_7: ‚ÄúThey always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself‚Äù
evening.content_8: ‚ÄúThere are no secret to success. It is the result of preparation, hard word and learning from failure‚Äù
evening.content_9: ‚ÄúThe beginning is the most important part of the work‚Äù
evening.content_10: ‚ÄúWhen you like your work every day is a holiday‚Äù
evening.content_11: ‚ÄúDoing what you like is freedom. Liking what you do is happiness‚Äù
evening.content_12: ‚ÄúAs a cure for worrying, work is better than whiskey‚Äù
evening.content_13: ‚ÄúI can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can‚Äôt accept not trying‚Äù

evening.content_16: ‚ÄúNo challenge shall never know all its capabilities‚Äù
evening.content_17: ‚ÄúSuccess is a journey not a destination‚Äù

birthday.title: Happy Birthday
birthday.content_1: ‚ÄúCount your life by smiles, not tears. Count your age by friends, not years. Happy birthday!‚Äù
birthday.content_2: ‚ÄúYour birthday is the first day of another 365-day journey. Be the shining thread in the beautiful tapestry of the world to make this year the best ever‚Äù
birthday.content_3: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs your birthday today, so I hope all your wishes come true. But you already have me, what more could you wish for??‚Äù
birthday.content_4: ‚ÄúA wish for you on your birthday, whatever you ask may you receive, whatever you seek may you find, whatever you wish may it be fulfilled on your birthday and always. Happy birthday!‚Äù
birthday.content_5: ‚ÄúMay the joy that you have spread in the past come back to you on this day. Wishing you a very happy birthday!‚Äù
birthday.content_6: ‚ÄúYour life is just about to pick up speed and blast off into the stratosphere. Wear a seat belt and be sure to enjoy the journey. Happy birthday!‚Äù
birthday.content_7: ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre older today than yesterday but younger than tomorrow, happy birthday!‚Äù
birthday.content_8: ‚ÄúHappy birthday to one of the few people whose birthday I can remember without a Facebook reminder‚Äù
birthday.content_9: ‚ÄúHappy Birthday! You know, you don‚Äôt look that old. But then, you don‚Äôt look that young, either‚Äù
birthday.content_10: ‚ÄúIf your birthday is half as amazing as you are, it gonna to be epic. Happy birthday to the best friend and colleague that a person could ask for!‚Äù
birthday.content_11: ‚ÄúHey, thanks for just being you. You are one of a kind and my best friend. Happy birthday and I hope with can have more chances to work together‚Äù
birthday.content_12: ‚ÄúThe best gift is the gift of friendship. So, now no know what I got you for your birthday! Don‚Äôt worry‚Ä¶ I got you a real present too‚Äù
birthday.content_13: ‚ÄúForget about the past, you can not change it. Forget about the future, you can not predict it. Forget about the present, I did not get you one. Happy birthday!‚Äù
birthday.content_14: ‚ÄúCongratulations on another year of skillful death evasion!‚Äù

thunderstorm.title: Thunderstorm
thunderstorm.content_1: ‚ÄúIt's thundering today, you'd better not go out‚Äù
thunderstorm.content_2: ‚ÄúThe weather is bad, let's stay in the room‚Äù

drizzle.title: Drizzle
drizzle.content_1: ‚ÄúIt's drizzling, don't forget to bring an umbrella when you go out‚Äù

rain.title: Rain
rain.content_1: ‚ÄúIt's raining, don't forget to bring a raincoat‚Äù
rain.content_2: ‚ÄúIt's raining, don't forget to bring an umbrella‚Äù

snow.title: Snow
snow.content_1: ‚ÄúIt's snowing, don't forget to wear warm clothes‚Äù

atmosphere.title: Atmosphere
atmosphere.content_1: ‚ÄúThe air outside is not so good, you'd better stay in your room‚Äù

clear.title: Clear
clear.content_1: ‚ÄúIt's sunny and not cloudy, wear sunscreen when going out‚Äù

clouds.title: Clouds
clouds.content_1: ‚ÄúToday is a beautiful day, let's go out and enjoy‚Äù

This action cannot be reverted and will affect the employee's past data (if any) in Time Off, Time Attendance and Payroll.
We highly recommend you back up the employee's data before changing the work schedule.

employee_time_off.validate_number: Must be a number greater than 0.

text.warning_delete_type: All time off requests and balances of this type will be permanently deleted and cannot be restored.

title.header_employee_add: employees will be added to this policy
title.header_employee_remove: employees will be removed to this policy

duration_allowed_description.hourly:
Employee can book time off by hours which will be calculated to days based on standard working hours.
Ex: Standard working hours = 8 hours/day, 3 hours off = 0.375 days
duration_allowed_description.halfday: Employee can book time off by 1st Half day or 2nd Half day, both are calculated as 0.5 days regardless of standard working hours.
duration_allowed_description.caution_halfday: üî• Once this option is selected and saved, it cannot be switched to another option when edit later.
duration_allowed_description.morningafternoon:
Employee can book time off by Morning or Afternoon which will be calculated based on standard working hours.
Ex: Standard working hours = 8 hours/day, Morning = 3 hours off = 0.375 days

text.view_list_employee: Click view_button to see the list
text.warning_effective_date: You're editing current eligibility. All changes made will be applied on the effective date.

keep_balance_description.keepbalance: Removed employees will still be able to keep their balance. All time off requests will remain unchanged.
keep_balance_description.removebalance: Removed employees will lose their balance. All time off requests will remain unchanged.

field_description.assign_date: The date which the policy is applicable to employees.
field_description.accrual_frequency: Yearly: entire entitlement accrued on the first of every year. Monthly: 1/12 of entitlement accrued on the first of every month.
field_description.prorate_accrual: Entitlement for each employee will be proportional to their actual working days.
field_description.maximum_carry_over: Maximum number of days employees can carry from one year to the next.

text_warning_duration_allowed.ul: After you change the Duration Allowed to {duration_allowed_change}
text_warning_duration_allowed.row_1: Employees can start booking time off by {duration_allowed_change}
text_warning_duration_allowed.row_2: All historical data will stay unchanged.

error.date_join_date: Date must be after or equal to join date
error.from_date_start_end_date: Start date must be less than start/end date of next scheduled record
error.to_date_start_end_date: End date must be less than start/end date of next scheduled record

text.employee_in_cycle: There are {number_employee} employees in this cycle .

note.general_note: You can only set the data at the first initialization, can not change the settings because it affects the existing data, if you need to change or contact Friday for better support.
note.cut_off_date_note: This is the latest date that payroll information should be submitted to calculate payroll
note.before_cut_off_date_note: Your person in charge will receive a reminder on that day

match_criteria.description: When using the ALL, the ANY and the EXCEPT FOR condition sets in conjunction, an employee must match every condition in the ALL section, plus at least one of the conditions in the ANY section, plus the EXCEPT FOR condition to be added to the group.

columns_description.meet_all: All conditions in this section must be true for an employee to be added to the group.
columns_description.meet_any: At least one condition in this section must be true for an employee to be added to the group. If there is only a single condition in this section, it must be true.

match_criterial_filter.auto_add_remove_employee: Automatically add or remove employees that match these criteria, except for Resigned employees.
